Module MailRegister
Package mappe.del3.addressregister.percistence

Class FileManagement

java.lang.Object
mappe.del3.addressregister.percistence.FileManagement
public class FileManagement
extends java.lang.Object
FileManagement is used for import and export of txt files.
Version:
2021-05-14
Author:
Sindre Glomnes

  • Method Details

    • importTxt

      public java.util.ArrayList<Address> importTxt​(MainController mainController)
      Chooses a txt UTF-8 file from the computer to read. Returns its addresses as a Arraylist. File chooser dialog only accepts txt files, and will therefore show a warning alert if a not valid file is chosen.
      Parameters:
      mainController - Instance of MainController
      Returns:
      Arraylist of addresses.

    • exportTxt

      public boolean exportTxt​(MainController mainController)
      Exports the addresses from the application to a txt file. The filename and filepath is determined by the user from a dialog. Shows warning alert if overwriting a old file.
      Parameters:
      mainController - Instance of MainController.

    • importCsv

      public java.util.ArrayList<Address> importCsv​(MainController mainController)
      Chooses a csv file from the computer to read. Returns its addresses as a Arraylist. File chooser dialog only accepts csv files, and will therefore show a warning alert if a not valid file is chosen.
      Parameters:
      mainController - Instance of MainController
      Returns:
      Arraylist of addresses.

    • exportCsv

      public boolean exportCsv​(MainController mainController)
      Exports the addresses from the application to a csv file. The filename and filepath is determined by the user from a dialog. Shows warning alert if overwriting a old file.
      Parameters:
      mainController - Instance of MainController.
